name: legacy_v0
description: Legacy manifest documenting the proven checkpoint that achieved AUC=0.933. Uses random feedback selection (not deterministic).

train.description: All 70 questions used in original experiment (random feedback per question)

eval.description: No held-out eval in legacy experiment
